title: Did you present this photo of John McCain meeting Abubakar al-Baghdadi?
subtitle: A photo taken in Syria in 2013 allegedly arrested Senator John McCain as a protestant with the leader of ISIL and the Levant Abubakar al-Baghdadi.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A photograph of Senator John McCain is shown demonstrating with the leader of ISIL Abubakar al-Baghdadi.
